hero.title: IT Solutions for Your Business
hero.subtitle: Web Development, Analytics, and Online Marketing

home_seo.title: White Eagles & Co. - IT Solutions & Web Development
home_seo.description: Professional web development, data analytics, and online marketing in Slovakia. Custom websites, bug fixing, and PPC campaigns to grow your business.
home_seo.keywords: web development, website creation, online marketing, PPC, Google Ads, analytics, GA4, telegram bots, IT solutions, Bratislava, Slovakia

webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.desc: Sites from scratch (PHP, Python, JS) or WordPress.
webdev.details: Custom websites, landing pages, and e-shops tailored to your needs.

bugfix.title: Bugfix & Features
bugfix.desc: Fixing errors on custom sites and WP.
bugfix.details: Troubleshooting, optimization, and adding new functionality.

ads.title: Online Advertising (Google/Meta)
ads.desc: Management and optimization of PPC campaigns.
ads.details: Setup and management of advertising campaigns on Google Ads and Facebook/Instagram.

analytics.title: Web Analytics Setup
analytics.desc: Sales funnel setup and e-commerce goals.
analytics.details: GA4, GTM, and custom event tracking implementation.

cookies.title: Cookie Banner (Consent Mode V2)
cookies.desc: Compliance with Google Consent Mode V2.
cookies.details: Implementation of compliant cookie consent banners.

telegram.title: Telegram Bot Development
telegram.desc: Bots for feedback, ordering, and automation.
telegram.details: Custom bot development including admin panels and CRM integrations.

biliardovna.desc: Website for a billiard club in Bratislava.

studiokrasy.desc: Multi-page website with a booking system.

topsklad.desc: Multifunctional website with a warehouse booking system.

bodabo.desc: Website for wholesale of vanilla, coffee, and cocoa beans.

about.title: About Me
about.years_sk: I have been living in Slovakia for over 6 years and have thoroughly studied the local market and its specifics.
about.knowledge: I know exactly what digital product to create and how to promote it for the maximum success of your business.
about.pride_title: Great Result without detailed Technical Specifications
about.pride_desc: Experience working with freelancers on the business side allowed me to identify the main pain point of cooperation: a large amount of time spent by company management writing a detailed technical specification to describe all business processes and expectations from the site. I never require a complex Technical Specification from the client and will propose the best solution for approval myself.

steps.title: Stages of Project Cooperation
steps.request_desc: Leave a request via the form and I will contact you as soon as possible.
steps.meeting_desc: We will meet in Bratislava / online to discuss project details and your expectations.
steps.process_desc: Execution of work with approval and periodic reports.
steps.delivery_desc: Acceptance, approval, implementation of revisions, and payment for work.
steps.success_stat: I completed 90% of complex projects within 15 working days

order.title: Order Service
order.success: We have received your information and will contact you as soon as possible during business hours.
order.name: Name
order.validation_error: Please fill in all required fields.
order.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
order.privacy: By submitting a request, you agree to the <1>personal data processing rules</1>.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Terms and conditions of use for White Eagles & Co. services.
terms.intro: These terms and conditions govern the use of our website and services.
terms.general_text: By accessing this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
terms.services_text: We provide web development, analytics, and marketing services as described on our website.
terms.payment_text: Payment terms are agreed upon individually for each project.
terms.liability_text: We are not liable for any indirect damages arising from the use of our services.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy.intro: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.controller_text: The data controller is White Eagles & Co. s.r.o., Kukučínova 12, 900 31 Stupava.
privacy.data_collection_text: We collect data through analytics tools to improve our services:
privacy.purpose_text: We use your data to analyze website traffic, improve user experience, and manage our marketing campaigns.
privacy.advertising_text: We use advertising platforms to reach potential customers:
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at welcome@whiteeagles.sk.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Information about how we use cookies.
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience.
cookies.what_are_text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
cookies.usage_text: We use cookies for analytics and marketing purposes:
cookies.ga4_desc: Used to distinguish users and analyze website traffic.
cookies.meta_desc: Used to track conversions from Facebook and Instagram ads.
cookies.clarity_desc: Used to analyze user behavior on the site (heatmaps, recordings).
cookies.management_text: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings.
